description:
Regala un pezzo unico, proprio come lei â¤ï¸

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

PoichÃ© Etsy non supporta i buoni, il destinatario puÃ² semplicemente mandarmi un'email o WhatsApp e il prodotto che vuole sarÃ  inviato meno il buono. 
O puoi scegliere una "CUSTOM.bag". 

Se non c'Ã¨ abbastanza tempo per inviarlo, vi invierÃ² il buono via PDF da stampare. 

Fai un regalo unico fatto a mano! 
Ogni R.lovely.bag Ã¨ fatta a mano con passione, cuore e cervello! Il destinatario puÃ² riscattare il buono per tutti i prodotti, per esempio su Etsy per un accessorio alla moda o una R.lovely "CHIEF.bag", un articolo unico disponibile immediatamente! 

Questa borsa Ã¨ realizzata interamente in modo individuale con una collaborazione personale secondo i suoi desideri. 
Perquesto Ã¨ e rimane un pezzo assolutamente unico ed Ã¨ quindi qualcosa molto speciale. 

Puoi scegliere il design giusto per il tuo pezzo unico tra piÃ¹ di 80 tessuti e look, molti modelli di borse, cinghie di pelle e borchie. La selezione delle borse, il "BAG-CHOOSING", avviene su appuntamento, direttamente nel mio studio a Chiusa o semplicemente via Zoom; voi a casa - e io nell'ATELIER. Dopo la sua preselezione del materiale, il cliente di CUSTOM.bag riceve diverse proposte di design sotto forma di un disegno, che simula la borsa finita e rende le sue idee visivamente visibili! title: Catena colorato e opaco
description:
Le catene possono essere indossati come una catena borsa, collana, collana e catena in vita. 

Come potete vedere nel video, Ã© possibile creare piÃ¹ di 80 nuove combinazioni di colori dalla catena di base con il set aggiuntivo. Qui puoi scegliere la tua base in 3 lunghezze e 7 colori. 

La catena di 53 cm puÃ² essere usata come collana corta o come manico corto per qualsiasi borsa. 
Con la catena da 80 cm si hanno piÃ¹ possibilitÃ , ad esempio: collana lunga, catena a spalla per la borsa. 
La lunga catena di 107 cm diventa rapidamente 2 collane corte o 4 braccialetti o le puoi anche usare come cintura in vita e collana lunga per la borsa. 

Potete accorciare la lunghezza della catena come volete. 
Le catene sono composte da maglie che possono essere facilmente inserite l'una nell'altra. 

53 cm di lunghezza della catena - 23 maglie a scelta 
80 cm di lunghezza della catena - 33 maglie a scelta 
107 cm di lunghezza della catena - 45 maglie a scelta 

Gli anelli a scatto in alluminio senza nichel sono in argento. ... e con il SET AGGIUNTIVO che contiene 3 - 6 o 9 pezzi in piÃ¹ di ognuno dei 3 colori, la vostra catena di base puÃ² essere trasformata in tutto ciÃ² che volete: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

title: Catene flessibile, scarpe particolari, catene per scarpe, catena nero, catena d oro, gioelli per scarpe, accessori per scarpe, r lovely
description:
La catena puÃ² essere attaccata a qualsiasi scarpa ed Ã¨ attualmente l'IT PIECE!

La catena ha una lunghezza di 39 cm, ma puÃ² essere regolata individualmente e si adatta anche a un comodo Ugg.

15 pezzi di anelli di catena incl. argento, metallica o due anelli d'oro.
anelli: Alluminio nichelato
Maglie della catena: plastica

Le catene sono fatte di maglie ad innesto che possono essere inserite e rimosse l'una dall'altra con una piccola pressione. CosÃ¬ puoi regolare la lunghezza della catena per adattarla a qualsiasi scarpa. ... scarpe da ginnastica alte ... con le tacchi alti intorno alle caviglie ... stivali invernali! 

Le catene sono dotate di un anello a scatto. Ma si puÃ² anche chiudere la catena di scarpe senza l'anello elastico e mettere le maglie direttamente l'una nell'altra. 

Lunghezza della catena 39 cm = 15 maglie di catena di cui una d'argento, una di metallo o due anelli d'oro.

Se vuoi dare alle tue catene da scarpe un tocco in piÃ¹, prendi il set aggiuntivo di "piccoli anelli colorati" e aggiungi anche questi!

title: Catena di base elegante
description:
Catena di base elegante

Queste catene eleganti sono molto popolari come catene per borse, collane, catene per mantelli e catene per la vita!

Si puÃ² scegliere tra 4 colori e 3 lunghezze diverse. 

Con l'aiuto dei due anelli, la catena lunga 53 cm puÃ² essere indossata come una collana corta cosÃ¬ come un manico corto e per pimpare qualsiasi borsa. 
La versione lunga 80 cm puÃ² essere usata sia come una lunga collana che come catena a spalla per la tua borsa. 
La catena lunga, 107cm, puÃ² essere indossata come una cintura in vita o come una lunga collana sulla tua borsa. 

Potete accorciare la lunghezza della catena come volete. La catena lunga di 107 cm puÃ² essere rapidamente trasformata in 2 collane corte o 4 braccialetti. Le catene sono composte da maglie che possono essere facilmente inserite l'una nell'altra. VoilÃ¡ lEGO per le signore! 

53 cm di lunghezza della catena - 23 pezzi di maglie in un colore a scelta
80 cm di lunghezza della catena - 33 pezzi di maglie nel colore di vostra scelta
107 cm di lunghezza della catena - 45 maglie del colore scelto

La catena monocolore puÃ² essere cambiata piÃ¹ volte con il set aggiuntivo (maglie di catena in altri colori)... dal nero opaco all'unicorno sull'arcobaleno...

Gli anelli a scatto in alluminio senza nichel sono fissati in oro / argento / o pistola metallica, a seconda del colore della catena.

Colore degli anelli di sicurezza:
Catena in nero / pistola metallica / marrone marmorizzato = 2 x anello elastico Metal Gun.
Catena in oro = 2 x anello elastico oro

... e con il SET AGGIUNTIVO che contiene 3 - 6 o 9 pezzi in piÃ¹ di ognuno dei 3 colori, la vostra catena di base puÃ² essere trasformata in qualsiasi cosa vogliate: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

title: Detergente, agente di pulizia per borsa
description:
Cura e pulizia professionale della finta pelle con estratto di buccia d'arancia.

Il contenuto della confezione Ã¨ un flacone spray da 80 ml.

Per motivi di sostenibilitÃ , la borsa R.lovely.bag Ã¨ realizzata in similpelle di alta qualitÃ  ed Ã¨ molto facile da curare. Lo sporco puÃ² essere facilmente rimosso con uno speciale detergente per finta pelle. Lo sporco normale si dissolve con una pulizia regolare, spruzzando e strofinando. I colori e il rivestimento sono in ottime condizioni. Per lo sporco piÃ¹ grossolano, il detergente viene spruzzato e, dopo cinque minuti di esposizione, massaggiato con una spazzola morbida e asciugato con un panno umido. Ãˆ possibile anche la pulizia con una soluzione di sapone neutro. Non pulire mai la finta pelle con detergenti aggressivi. Lo sporco verrÃ  rimosso bene, ma anche lo strato protettivo. CONSIGLIO: le penne a sfera vanno rimosse IMMEDIATAMENTE con la lacca per capelli. Spruzzare, togliere e pulire con acqua e detergente per similpelle. Una volta asciugata, la penna a sfera non puÃ² piÃ¹ essere rimossa.

title: R - lovely Voucher - For designing your own handbag (Unique Handbags & Accessories), gift for her, mothers day gift, birthday gift
description:
Give her YOUR THING! A unique piece, just like she is â¤ï¸.			
				
The voucher consists of a box containing many small fabric samples and a voucher card.		

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Because Etsy doesn't support vouchers, the recipient can simply send me an email or WhatsApp and the product she wants will be sent minus the voucher. 
OUR she chooses a "CUSTOM.bag". 

Give a unique gift that is handmade! 
Each R.lovely.bag is handmade with passion, heart and brain! The recipient can use the voucher for all products. On the Etsy online shop for a trendy accessory or an R.lovely "CHIEF.bag", a unique item available immediately! 
This bag is made completely individually according to her wishes through personal collaboration. This bag is and remains an absolutely unique piece and therefore something very special. 

From over 80 fabrics and looks, many bag models, leather straps and rivets, the right design can be chosen for the unique piece. 
The bag selection, the "BAG-CHOOSING", is done by appointment either directly at my studio in Chiusa or easy peasy via Zoom; you at home - and me at the ATELIER. The CUSTOM.bag customer receives after her material selection several design proposals in the form of a drawing that simulates the finished bag and makes her ideas visually visible! After a successful selection, I make the bag and put her name on the inside. 

If there is not enough time, I will send you the voucher as a PDF to print out.

YOU ARE UNIQUE! ME TOO!!!

title: Basic chain colourful and matt
description:
The chains can be worn as a bag chain, necklace and waist chain. 

As you can see in the video, you can create over 80 new colour combinations from the basic chain with the additional set. 

Here you choose your base in 3 lengths and 7 colours. 

The 53 cm chain can be used as a short necklace or as a short handle for any bag. 
With the 80 cm chain, you have more possibilities e.g.: a long necklace, a shoulder chain for the bag. 
You can even use the 107 cm chain as a waist belt and long necklace for the bag. 

You can shorten the length of the chain as you like. The long 107 cm chain quickly become 2 short necklaces or 4 bracelets.

title: Shoe chain elegant, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, flexible chain, shoes unique, unique chain, gold shoe charms, r lovely, chunky chain
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence.

The chain has a length of 39 cm, but can be individually adjusted and even fits around a cosy Ugg.

15 pieces of chain links incl. silver, metal gun or two gold rings.
rings: Nickel plated aluminium
Chain links: plastic

The chains are made of plug-in links that can be inserted into and removed from each other with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... with pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! 

The chains are equipped by a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

Chain length 39 cm = 15 chain links including one silver, metal gun or two gold rings.

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, get the additional set of "little colourful rings" and add them too!

Basic Chain Elegant Shiny

These elegant chains are very popular as bag chain, necklace and waist chain!

The standard hair band is attached to the snap rings, which are available in silver, gold and metal gun. This makes the "HAIRCHAIN" elastic and therefore comfortable. If you want to put the chain around your high ponytail, chignon or chignon, shorten the chain and put the ends directly into each other without the snap ring.

When you don't need the chain for your hair, wear it as a necklace, bracelet or short handle for your bag. Tada! A chain for all occasions!

Material & Dimensions
Chain: 100% acrylic acetate
Length incl. snap hook: 53 cm= 22 chain pieces
2 snap rings: Nickel-free aluminium
1 standard hair elastic

title: care and cleaning imitation leather, care set for bag
description:
Professional care and cleaning for imitation leather with orange peel extract.

Delivery content is a spray bottle of 80 ml.

The R.lovely.bag is made of high quality imitation leather for sustainability reasons and is very easy to clean. Dirt can be easily removed with a special imitation leather cleaner. Normal dirt dissolves with regular cleaning by spraying and wiping away. The colors and the coating remain so top. For coarser soiling, the cleaner is sprayed on and, after five minutes of exposure, massaged out with a soft brush and wiped off with a damp cloth. Cleaning with a mild soap solution is also possible. Please never clean imitation leather with harsh cleaning agents. The dirt is well removed with it, however, the protective layer also. TIP: Ballpoint pen is best removed IMMEDIATELY with hairspray. Spray on, wipe off, wipe with water and leatherette cleaner. Dried up Kulli can no longer be removed.

title: Shoe chain elegant, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, flexible chain, shoes unique, unique chain, gold shoe charms, r lovely, chunky chain
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence.

The chain has a length of 39 cm, but can be individually adjusted and even fits around a cosy Ugg.

15 pieces of chain links incl. silver, metal gun or two gold rings.
rings: Nickel plated aluminium
Chain links: plastic

The chains are made of plug-in links that can be inserted into and removed from each other with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... with pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! 

The chains are equipped by a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

Chain length 39 cm = 15 chain links including one silver, metal gun or two gold rings.

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, get the additional set of "little colourful rings" and add them too!

description:
Geef haar HAAR DING! Een uniek stuk, precies zoals het is â¤ï¸

De voucher bestaat uit een doos met daarin veel kleine stofmonsters en de cadeaubon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Omdat Etsy geen kortingsbonnen ondersteunt, kan de ontvanger me gewoon een e-mail of WhatsApp sturen en het gewenste product wordt minus de coupon verzonden.
OOODER kiest ze voor een "CUSTOM.bag".

Als de tijd voor een zending te kort is, stuur ik u de voucher via PDF om af te drukken.

Geef een uniek stuk dat handgemaakt is!
Elke R.lovely.bag is handgemaakt met passie, hart en hersenen in individueel werk! De ontvanger kan de voucher voor alle producten, bijvoorbeeld in de Etsy online shop, inwisselen voor een trendy accessoire of een R.lovely "CHIEF.bag", een direct verkrijgbaar uniek stuk!

Deze tas wordt individueel gemaakt door persoonlijke samenwerking volgens uw wensen. Deze tas is en blijft een absoluut uniek stuk en is daarom iets heel bijzonders.

Uit meer dan 80 stoffen en optiek, vele tasmodellen, leren riemen en klinknagels kan het juiste ontwerp voor het unieke stuk worden geselecteerd.
De tassenselectie, de "BAG-CHOOSING" vindt plaats op afspraak. Ofwel direct bij mij in de studio in Klausen of easy peasy via ONLINE MEETING; Jij thuis - en ik in het ATELIER. Na haar materiaalvoorkeuze ontvangt de CUSTOM.bag-klant verschillende ontwerpsuggesties in de vorm van een tekening, die de afgewerkte tas simuleert en haar ideeÃ«n visueel zichtbaar maakt! title: Chunkychain Base Chain Kleurrijke Mat geel geel
description:
De basisketting in kleurrijk en mat

De kettingen kunnen gedragen worden als zakketting, ketting, schouderketting en tailleketting.

Zoals te zien is in de video, kunnen meer dan 80 nieuwe kleurencombinaties worden gemaakt van de basisketen met de extra set.

Hier kies je je basis in 3 lengtes en 7 kleuren.

De ketting van 53 cm kan worden gebruikt als een korte ketting of als een kort handvat voor elke tas.
Met de 80 cm ketting heb je meer mogelijkheden e.B.: lange ketting, schouderketting voor de tas.
Je kunt de 107 cm ketting zelfs gebruiken als tailleriem en lange schouderketting voor de tas.

U kunt de lengte van de ketting naar wens inkorten. De lange ketting van 107 cm wordt al snel 2 korte kettingen, oftewel 4 armbanden.
De kettingen bestaan uit plug-in schakels die eenvoudig op elkaar aangesloten kunnen worden.

53 cm kettinglengte â€“ 23 plug-in schakels naar keuze
80 cm kettinglengte â€“ 33 stuks plug-in schakels naar keuze kleur
107 cm kettinglengte â€“ 45 stuks plug-in schakels naar keuze kleur

Als u geen personalisatie toevoegt, worden de klikringen opgenomen in de kleur zilver.

... en met de ADDITIONAL SET die nog 3 â€“ 6 of 9 delen van elk van de 3 kleuren bevat, verandert je basisketting in wat je maar wilt: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

title: Schoenketting dr martens, schakelketting als schoenketting, schoenaccessoire, schoenbedel, schoenkettingen goud, r mooi, schoenjuwelen
description:
De schoenketting kan aan elke schoen worden bevestigd en is momenteel het IT PIECE bij uitstek.

De ketting heeft een lengte van 39 cm, maar is individueel aanpasbaar en past zelfs om een knuffelige Uggs heen.

15 stuks kettingschakels incl. zilver, metalen pistool of twee gouden ringen
Ringen: Nickelfeies Aluminium
Kettingschakels: kunststof

De kettingen bestaan uit plug-in schakels die met lichte druk in elkaar kunnen worden gestoken en weer losgelaten kunnen worden. Zo pas je de ketting in lengte aan elk van je schoenen aan. ... hoge sneakers ... met pompen rond de boeien... ga naar de winterlaarzen! De twee kettingen zijn elk voorzien van een klikring. U kunt de schoenketting ook sluiten zonder de klikring en de schakels direct in elkaar steken.

Kettinglengte 39 cm = 15 stuks kettingschakels incl. een zilveren, metalen pistool of twee gouden ringen.

Als je je schoenkettingen toch de absolute kick wilt geven, koop dan de extra set "kleine kleurrijke snoepjes" en hang ze er ook aan! Over? Nee! Laat het crashen!

title: Chunkychain Base Chain Elegant gemÃªleerd bruin
description:
Basisketting Elegant

Kies uit de 4 kleuren - zwart - metal gun - goud - gemÃªleerd bruin en 3 verschillende lengtes.

Veelzijdig draagbaar dankzij de klikringen - ketting, zakketting, schouderketting en tailleketting

Met behulp van de twee klikringen kan de 53 cm lange ketting zowel als korte ketting als als kort handvat worden gedragen en voor het dweilen van elke tas.
De 80 cm lange versie kan worden gebruikt als een lange ketting en een schouderketting voor uw tas.
De lange ketting, 107 cm, draag je als tailleriem of als lange schouderketting aan je tas.

U kunt de lengte van de ketting naar wens inkorten. De lange ketting van 107 cm wordt al snel 2 korte kettingen, oftewel 4 armbanden. De kettingen bestaan uit plug-in schakels die eenvoudig op elkaar aangesloten kunnen worden. VoilÃ¡ lEGO for lADYS!

53 cm kettinglengte â€“ 23 plug-in schakels naar keuze
80 cm kettinglengte â€“ 33 stuks plug-in schakels naar keuze kleur
107 cm kettinglengte â€“ 45 stuks plug-in schakels naar keuze kleur

De monochrome ketting kan steeds opnieuw worden getransformeerd met de extra set (kettingschakels in andere kleuren)... van matzwart tot Unicorn on the Rainbow...

De klikringen van nikkelvrij aluminium zijn gemonteerd in goud / zilver / of metalen pistool, afhankelijk van de kleur van de ketting.

Als u geen personalisatie toevoegt, zijn de snapringen in de volgende kleuren opgenomen:
Ketting in zwart / metalen pistool / gemarmerd bruin = 2 x klikring Metal Gun
Ketting in goud = 2 x snap ring goud

... en met de ADDITIONAL SET die nog 3 â€“ 6 of 9 delen van elk van de 3 kleuren bevat, verandert je basisketting in wat je maar wilt: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

description:

PRODUCTINFORMATIE:
Haarband â€“ Paardenstaart- Dutt- Chignon Sieraden
De ketting van hoogwaardig acrylaat is een plug-in systeem. Hiermee kunt u de kettingschakels scheiden of in elkaar steken en precies op de gewenste lengte instellen. Het in de handel verkrijgbare haarrubber is bevestigd aan de klikringen, optioneel in zilver, goud en metalen pistool. Dit maakt de "HAIRCHAIN" elastisch en dus ook comfortabel. Als je de ketting om je hoge paardenstaart, dutt, rommelige knot of chignon wilt doen, verkort dan de ketting en steek de uiteinden direct in elkaar zonder de klikring.

Als je de ketting niet nodig hebt voor je haar, draag hem dan als ketting, armband of kort handvat voor je tas. Tada! Een keten voor alle gelegenheden!

title: ONLINE ATELIER, gepersonaliseerde tas, tas op maat, ontwerp je eigen tas, ontwerp je eigen tas online, rugzak, schoudertas
description:
Hallo! Wilt u een uniek stuk dat persoonlijk op u is afgestemd en exclusief voor u met de hand wordt gemaakt? ja!

Na ontvangst van de bestelling stuur ik u een uitgebreide vragenlijst waarnaar u mij terugstuurt. Hierdoor kan ik uw wensen en eisen aan uw unieke stuk leren kennen!

Binnen 5 dagen stuur ik je 5 persoonlijk op maat gemaakte ontwerpontwerpen. De 30,00â‚¬ zijn geldig als aanbetaling bij het bestellen van uw enkelstuk. Uiteraard passen we je ontwerp nog verder aan en dat totdat het perfect is voor jou en ik begin met knippen en naaien!

Als de ontwerpen je niet bevallen krijg je 15,00 â‚¬ terug en 15,00 â‚¬ is voor mij een kleine onkostenvergoeding.

De schoenketting kan aan elke schoen worden bevestigd en is momenteel het it-stuk bij uitstek. De ketting is 39 cm lang en past om je dikke knuffelige Uggs. De ketting bestaat uit plug-in schakels die met lichte druk in elkaar kunnen worden gestoken en weer kunnen worden losgelaten. Zo pas je de ketting in lengte aan elk van je schoenen aan. ... hoge sneakers ... met pompen rond de boeien... ga naar de winterlaarzen! De twee kettingen zijn elk voorzien van een klikring. Je kunt de schoenketting ook zonder de klikring sluiten en de schakels direct in elkaar steken.

title: Verzorgen en reinigen van kunstleer, verzorgingsset voor handtas
description:
Professionele verzorging en reiniging van kunstleer met sinaasappelschilextract

De inhoud van de levering is een spuitflacon van 80 ml.

De R.lovely.bag is om duurzaamheidsredenen gemaakt van hoogwaardig kunstleer en is zeer eenvoudig schoon te maken. Met een speciale synthetisch leerreiniger kan vuil eenvoudig worden verwijderd. Normaal vuil lost op bij regelmatige reiniging door sproeien en wegvegen. De kleuren en de coating blijven zo perfect behouden. In het geval van grover vuil wordt de reiniger na vijf minuten blootstellingstijd met een zachte borstel besproeid en gemasseerd en een vochtige doek afgeveegd. Schoonmaken met een mild sopje is ook mogelijk. Reinig kunstleer nooit met agressieve reinigingsmiddelen. Het vuil wordt dus goed verwijderd, maar dat geldt ook voor de beschermlaag. TIP: Balpen kun je het beste DIRECT verwijderen met haarlak. Spray erop, veeg weg, veeg af met water en kunstleerreiniger. Gedroogde kulli kan niet meer worden verwijderd.

De ketting van hoogwaardig acrylaat is een plug-in systeem. Hiermee kunt u de kettingschakels scheiden of in elkaar steken en precies op de gewenste lengte instellen. Het in de handel verkrijgbare haarrubber is bevestigd aan de klikringen, optioneel in zilver, goud en metalen pistool. Dit maakt de "HAIRCHAIN" elastisch en dus ook comfortabel. Als je de ketting om je hoge paardenstaart, dutt, rommelige knot of chignon wilt doen, verkort dan de ketting en steek de uiteinden direct in elkaar zonder de klikring.

Als je de ketting niet nodig hebt voor je haar, draag hem dan als ketting, armband of kort handvat voor je tas. Tada! Een keten voor alle gelegenheden!


Leveringsomvang MATERIAAL & AFMETINGEN
Ketting: 100% acrylacetaat
Lengte incl. klikringen: 53 cm= 22 kettingdelen
2 snapringen: nikkelvrij aluminium
1 commercieel haarrubber

description:
MODEL Wallet "Portemonnee & georganiseerde Microbag"

PRODUCTINFORMATIE:
Dit unieke stuk is handgemaakt.
De portemonnee heeft tien kaartvakken, twee vakken met rits aan de zijkanten en twee sleuven aan de binnenkant. In de ritsvakken is ruimte voor munten en/of paspoorten en kaarten die niet dagelijks in gebruik zijn. De twee grote zakken aan de binnenkant zijn geschikt voor bankbiljetten en de smartphone met een maximale hoogte van 16,5 cm. Aan de zijkanten zijn 2 D-ringen bevestigd. De polsketting met karabijnhaak (deze is incl. bevestigd) kan eraan worden bevestigd.
Optioneel: Een lange schouderketting "CHAIN>>>" verandert uw portemonnee in een georganiseerde microtas

title: R - lovely Voucher - For designing your own handbag (Unique Handbags & Accessories), gift for her, mothers day gift, birthday gift
description:
Give her YOUR THING! A unique piece, just like she is â¤ï¸.			
				
The voucher consists of a box containing many small fabric samples and a voucher card.		

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Because Etsy doesn't support vouchers, the recipient can simply send me an email or WhatsApp and the product she wants will be sent minus the voucher. 
OUR she chooses a "CUSTOM.bag". 

Give a unique gift that is handmade! 
Each R.lovely.bag is handmade with passion, heart and brain! The recipient can use the voucher for all products. On the Etsy online shop for a trendy accessory or an R.lovely "CHIEF.bag", a unique item available immediately! 
This bag is made completely individually according to her wishes through personal collaboration. This bag is and remains an absolutely unique piece and therefore something very special. 

From over 80 fabrics and looks, many bag models, leather straps and rivets, the right design can be chosen for the unique piece. 
The bag selection, the "BAG-CHOOSING", is done by appointment either directly at my studio in Chiusa or easy peasy via Zoom; you at home - and me at the ATELIER. The CUSTOM.bag customer receives after her material selection several design proposals in the form of a drawing that simulates the finished bag and makes her ideas visually visible! After a successful selection, I make the bag and put her name on the inside. 

If there is not enough time, I will send you the voucher as a PDF to print out.

YOU ARE UNIQUE! ME TOO!!!

title: Basic chain colourful and matt
description:
The chains can be worn as a bag chain, necklace and waist chain. 

As you can see in the video, you can create over 80 new colour combinations from the basic chain with the additional set. 

Here you choose your base in 3 lengths and 7 colours. 

The 53 cm chain can be used as a short necklace or as a short handle for any bag. 
With the 80 cm chain, you have more possibilities e.g.: a long necklace, a shoulder chain for the bag. 
You can even use the 107 cm chain as a waist belt and long necklace for the bag. 

You can shorten the length of the chain as you like. The long 107 cm chain quickly become 2 short necklaces or 4 bracelets. 
The chains consist of links that can easily be inserted into each other. VoilÃ¡ lEGO for lADYS! 

53 cm chain length - 23 pieces of links in your choice of colour
80 cm chain length - 33 pieces of links in the colour of your choice
107 cm chain length - 45 links of your chosen colour

The nickel-free aluminium snap rings are silver.

... and with the ADDITIONAL SET containing 3 - 6 or 9 more pieces of each of the 3 colours, your basic chain can be transformed into anything you want: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

title: Shoe chain elegant, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, flexible chain, shoes unique, unique chain, gold shoe charms, r lovely, chunky chain
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence.

The chain has a length of 39 cm, but can be individually adjusted and even fits around a cosy Ugg.

15 pieces of chain links incl. silver, metal gun or two gold rings.
rings: Nickel plated aluminium
Chain links: plastic

The chains are made of plug-in links that can be inserted into and removed from each other with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... with pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! 

The chains are equipped by a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

Chain length 39 cm = 15 chain links including one silver, metal gun or two gold rings.

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, get the additional set of "little colourful rings" and add them too!

title: Shoe chain with leather strap, shoe accessories, gold chain, flexible chain, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, shoe charms chain, chunky, rlovely
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence. 

Chain: 39 cm long, 9 chain links including a silver, metal gun or two gold rings and a leather strap with or without rivets. 

The chain fits perfectly around your thick cosy Ugg. 

The chains are made up of links that can be inserted into each other and removed again with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! Each of the two chains has a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, why not get the additional set of "little coloured rings" and add these too? 
Too much? NO!

Total length: 39 cm 
Straps: Genuine leather 
Rings: Nickel-plated aluminium 
Chain links: Plastic

title: care and cleaning imitation leather, care set for bag
description:
Professional care and cleaning for imitation leather with orange peel extract.

Delivery content is a spray bottle of 80 ml.

The R.lovely.bag is made of high quality imitation leather for sustainability reasons and is very easy to clean. Dirt can be easily removed with a special imitation leather cleaner. Normal dirt dissolves with regular cleaning by spraying and wiping away. The colors and the coating remain so top. For coarser soiling, the cleaner is sprayed on and, after five minutes of exposure, massaged out with a soft brush and wiped off with a damp cloth. Cleaning with a mild soap solution is also possible. Please never clean imitation leather with harsh cleaning agents. The dirt is well removed with it, however, the protective layer also. TIP: Ballpoint pen is best removed IMMEDIATELY with hairspray. Spray on, wipe off, wipe with water and leatherette cleaner. Dried up Kulli can no longer be removed.

title: R - lovely Voucher - For designing your own handbag (Unique Handbags & Accessories), gift for her, mothers day gift, birthday gift
description:
Give her YOUR THING! A unique piece, just like she is â¤ï¸.			
				
The voucher consists of a box containing many small fabric samples and a voucher card.		

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Because Etsy doesn't support vouchers, the recipient can simply send me an email or WhatsApp and the product she wants will be sent minus the voucher. 
OUR she chooses a "CUSTOM.bag". 

Give a unique gift that is handmade! 
Each R.lovely.bag is handmade with passion, heart and brain! The recipient can use the voucher for all products. On the Etsy online shop for a trendy accessory or an R.lovely "CHIEF.bag", a unique item available immediately! 
This bag is made completely individually according to her wishes through personal collaboration. This bag is and remains an absolutely unique piece and therefore something very special. 

From over 80 fabrics and looks, many bag models, leather straps and rivets, the right design can be chosen for the unique piece. 
The bag selection, the "BAG-CHOOSING", is done by appointment either directly at my studio in Chiusa or easy peasy via Zoom; you at home - and me at the ATELIER. The CUSTOM.bag customer receives after her material selection several design proposals in the form of a drawing that simulates the finished bag and makes her ideas visually visible! After a successful selection, I make the bag and put her name on the inside. 

If there is not enough time, I will send you the voucher as a PDF to print out.

YOU ARE UNIQUE! ME TOO!!!

title: Basic chain colourful and matt
description:
The chains can be worn as a bag chain, necklace and waist chain. 

As you can see in the video, you can create over 80 new colour combinations from the basic chain with the additional set. 

Here you choose your base in 3 lengths and 7 colours. 

The 53 cm chain can be used as a short necklace or as a short handle for any bag. 
With the 80 cm chain, you have more possibilities e.g.: a long necklace, a shoulder chain for the bag. 
You can even use the 107 cm chain as a waist belt and long necklace for the bag. 

You can shorten the length of the chain as you like. The long 107 cm chain quickly become 2 short necklaces or 4 bracelets. 
The chains consist of links that can easily be inserted into each other. VoilÃ¡ lEGO for lADYS! 

53 cm chain length - 23 pieces of links in your choice of colour
80 cm chain length - 33 pieces of links in the colour of your choice
107 cm chain length - 45 links of your chosen colour

The nickel-free aluminium snap rings are silver.

... and with the ADDITIONAL SET containing 3 - 6 or 9 more pieces of each of the 3 colours, your basic chain can be transformed into anything you want: https://www.etsy.com/de/listing/1146761941/zusatzkettenglieder-3er-und-6er-set

title: Shoe chain elegant, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, flexible chain, shoes unique, unique chain, gold shoe charms, r lovely, chunky chain
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence.

The chain has a length of 39 cm, but can be individually adjusted and even fits around a cosy Ugg.

15 pieces of chain links incl. silver, metal gun or two gold rings.
rings: Nickel plated aluminium
Chain links: plastic

The chains are made of plug-in links that can be inserted into and removed from each other with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... with pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! 

The chains are equipped by a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

Chain length 39 cm = 15 chain links including one silver, metal gun or two gold rings.

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, get the additional set of "little colourful rings" and add them too!

title: Basic Chain Elegant
description:
Basic Chain Elegant Shiny

These elegant chains are very popular as bag chain, necklace and waist chain!

You can choose from 4 colours and 3 different lengths. 

With the help of the two lobster rings, the 53 cm long chain can be worn as a short necklace as well as a short handle and for pimping any bag. 
The 80 cm long version can be used as a long necklace as well as a shoulder chain for your bag. 
The long chain, 107cm, can be worn as a waist belt or as a long necklace on your bag. 

You can shorten the length of the chain as you like. The long 107cm chain can quickly be turned into 2 short necklaces or 4 bracelets. The chains are made of links that can easily be plugged into each other. VoilÃ¡ lEGO for lADYS! 

53 cm chain length - 23 pieces of links in your choice of colour
80 cm chain length - 33 pieces of links in the colour of your choice
107 cm chain length - 45 links of your chosen colour

The single-coloured chain can be changed again and again with the additional set (chain links in other colours)... from matt black to Unicorn on the Rainbow...

The snap rings made of nickel-free aluminium are attached in gold / silver / or metal gun, depending on the chain colour.

Colour of the snap rings:
Chain in black / metal gun / marbled brown = 2 x snap ring Metal Gun.
Chain in gold = 2 x snap ring gold

description:
The chains can be worn as a bag chain, necklace and waist chain. 

As you can see in the video, you can create over 80 new colour combinations from the basic chain with the additional set. 

Here you choose your base in 3 lengths and 7 colours. 

The 53 cm chain can be used as a short necklace or as a short handle for any bag. 
With the 80 cm chain, you have more possibilities e.g.: a long necklace, a shoulder chain for the bag. 
You can even use the 107 cm chain as a waist belt and long necklace for the bag.

title: Shoe chain with leather strap, shoe accessories, gold chain, flexible chain, shoe charms, shoe jewelry, shoe charms chain, chunky, rlovely
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence. 

Chain: 39 cm long, 9 chain links including a silver, metal gun or two gold rings and a leather strap with or without rivets. 

The chain fits perfectly around your thick cosy Ugg. 

The chains are made up of links that can be inserted into each other and removed again with a little pressure. So you can adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! Each of the two chains has a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 

If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, why not get the additional set of "little coloured rings" and add these too? 
Too much? NO!

Total length: 39 cm 
Straps: Genuine leather 
Rings: Nickel-plated aluminium 
Chain links: Plastic

title: Basic chain small
description:
"The base chain" 

bag chain / necklace / glasses chain / cell phone chain 

You choose your base in 2 lengths and 6 colors. 

With the help of the carabiner rings, the 53 cm long chain can be worn as a short necklace as well as arbitrarily as a short handle and pimp your evening bag. The 80 cm version can be used both as a long necklace and as a shoulder chain for a small bag. 

You can shorten the length of the chain as you wish. The chains consist of links that separate from each other by pressing on the last link of the chain. 


53 cm chain length - 40 links in the color of your choice 
80 cm chain length - 64 links in the color of your choice 

The small carabiner can be released with a careful but sweeping tug.

The carabiner is gold/silver/or metal pistol depending on the chain color. 

Color of the carabiner: 
chain in cream / light blue = 2 x gold

title: care and cleaning imitation leather, care set for bag
description:
Professional care and cleaning for imitation leather with orange peel extract.

Delivery content is a spray bottle of 80 ml.

The R.lovely.bag is made of high quality imitation leather for sustainability reasons and is very easy to clean. Dirt can be easily removed with a special imitation leather cleaner. Normal dirt dissolves with regular cleaning by spraying and wiping away. The colors and the coating remain so top. For coarser soiling, the cleaner is sprayed on and, after five minutes of exposure, massaged out with a soft brush and wiped off with a damp cloth. Cleaning with a mild soap solution is also possible. Please never clean imitation leather with harsh cleaning agents. The dirt is well removed with it, however, the protective layer also. TIP: Ballpoint pen is best removed IMMEDIATELY with hairspray. Spray on, wipe off, wipe with water and leatherette cleaner. Dried up Kulli can no longer be removed.

title: Shoe chain coloured, shoe jewelry, shoe charms, chunky charm and chain, chain unique, accessories, chunky chain, r lovely
description:
The shoe chain can be attached to any shoe and is currently the IT PIECE par excellence.
The length of the chain is 39 cm, but it is completely customisable and even fits around your thick, cosy Uggs!

Chain length: 39cm, 15 chain links each including two silver, metal gun or gold rings
Colours: pink, turquoise, pink, purple and pastel yellow

Material:
The rings are made of nickel-free aluminium
The chain links are made of plastic

------------------------------------------------------------------

The chain consists of links that can be inserted into and removed from each other with a little pressure. You can easily adjust the length of the chain to fit any of your shoes. ... high sneakers ... with pumps around the ankles ... go for the winter boots! 
The two ends of the chain are each fitted with a snap ring. But you can also close the shoe chain without the snap ring and put the links directly into each other. 


If you want to give your shoe chains an extra kick, get the additional set of "little colourful rings" and add these too! 
Too much? No!
